resources.string: Enter a message and a key
Error: Only letters in message field are allowed
Something went wrong. Please try again
Enter a single integer value to shift the alphabet. For example, a shift of 1 would change "a" to "b" and "b" to "c".
Enter a any string to generate an alphabet based on it.

Enter a keyword to generate a polyalphabetic substitution cipher. The keyword will be repeated to match the length of the message. For example, a keyword of "crypto" will generate a cipher with a repeating pattern of "c-r-y-p-t-o".

Enter a sequence of numbers representing the permutation of the alphabet. For example, "2 1 4 3" would swap the 1st and 2nd letters, and the 3rd and 4th letters. The sequence should contain numbers from 1 to 26, without duplicates.

Enter a sequence of numbers representing the permutation of the alphabet, with multiple swaps. For example, "2 1 4 3 6 5" would swap the 1st and 2nd letters, the 3rd and 4th letters, and the 5th and 6th letters. The sequence should contain numbers from 1 to 26, without duplicates.
